price: Jecha tokkoyyuu hin dubbatu Tiksaan itti dhihaataan isa bira jiraatu malee .
arabic: مَّا يَلۡفِظُ مِن قَوۡلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيۡهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: mā yalfiẓu min qawlin illā ladayhi raqībun ʿatīdun
